instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.PP1V5_S0: What is PP1V5_S0? PP1V5_S0 is a 1.5v power rail present when the machine is in an S0 working state.

threads.title: Imac 21.5 A1418 820 3302, On and Off cycling!!
threads.message:
Hey, 

This machine when i press start, fan spin 1 sec and off.. Cycling! 

no water damage, board looks well! But when i dismounted the machine i saw that it was full off dust! 

could be a power supply ??

threads.title: Imac 21.5 A1418 820 3302, On and Off cycling!!
threads.message: <SIGNAL>PP12V_G3H</SIGNAL> present and stable? Usually is a shorted USB port.....

threads.title: Imac 21.5 A1418 820 3302, On and Off cycling!!
Imac 21.5 A1418 820 3302, On and Off cycling!!
threads.message: usb's OK.. but without ram's the machine stay's on!! with rams = looping!

threads.title: Imac 21.5 A1418 820 3302, On and Off cycling!!
threads.message: i already test ram's and no short in <SIGNAL>PP1V5_S0</SIGNAL>!

threads.title: Imac 21.5 A1418 820 3302, On and Off cycling!!
threads.message: Does it beep without the RAM?

threads.title: Imac 21.5 A1418 820 3302, On and Off cycling!!
threads.message:
Good Morning Duke, 

Yes, the machine beeps without a Ram!

threads.title: Imac 21.5 A1418 820 3302, On and Off cycling!!
threads.message: Pffff, could be anything....Known good power supply first and check all rails for shorts.

threads.title: Imac 21.5 A1418 820 3302, On and Off cycling!!
threads.message: tested with a new power supply and can't fin any short in power rails !! I think it's going to be another imac that I can't solve.=(

threads.title: Imac 21.5 A1418 820 3302, On and Off cycling!!
threads.message: Last thing to try is BIOS. SAFE THE OLD DUMP!!!
